channel.title: Owl be there for you! on Blist Multilingual Theme

item.title: Burrowing owl chicks near a burrow, Wyoming (© Danita Delimont/Getty Images)
item.description: 图文来源自：bing. copyright: © Danita Delimont/Getty Images In today’s image, we see four burrowing owls in Wyoming, USA, standing near their burrow, looking like a band of mischievous siblings. Known for their distinctive white eyebrows and yellow eyes, these owls are active during the day, hunting insects and small mammals. These resilient species, capable of surviving for at least 9 years in the wild and surpassing 10 years in captivity, face numerous threats in their environment.
